segments.text: Tomorrow I'll take you to some places that I'm sure you will have interest in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where else haven't I been to yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not many but these ones . They are the Folk Antique Handicrafts and Collectibles Exhibition Halls !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds great ! How many kinds of folk collections they have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there're actually over 200 kinds of folk collections in this city , that's half the collections of antique objects in China . There's one exhibition hall for multiple collection , and several individual display rooms for private collections .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Private collectors ! Oh , they must have excellent collections . I'll go and see each of them . What kinds of collections can I see ? Come on , David , don't keep me in suspense !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No hurry ! I'll tell you now . The collections include ancient cases and caskets , tea sets , abacuses , precious sea shells and conches , jars and water abacuses for study use , drama costumes , agates , ancient coins , butterflies , fans , mini musical instruments , root-carving , rare stones and rocks , model ships , model cars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Enough , David ! I can't wait anymore . Let's go right now !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okey , Okey . We'll start from the Folk Collection Exhibition House , a multi-folk collection exhibition hall , where the best of local antique objects are on constant display . The hall itself used to be the site of a local club in the late King Dynasty , a well preserved piece of antique architecture itself . Academic research seminars and exchanges between domestic and international experts are often organized there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very interesting . That's really a place I must go and see . And then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have interest in butterflies , you must go to the Butterfly Exhibition . Mr . Chen , owner of the private museum , has a large collection of specimen of over 1 000 species of butterflies from more than 20 countries for public display . Quite a lot of them are state-level treasures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Chen himself has become an authority in this area , and master of butterfly sample making , I should say .
segments.speaker: S2
